headline.main: U.S. House Speaker Ryan Says Obama Sanctions Against Russia Overdue
headline.print_headline: U.S. House Speaker Ryan Says Obama Sanctions Against Russia Overdue

docs.lead_paragraph: U.S. House of Representatives Speaker Paul Ryan said on Thursday Russia "has consistently sought to undermine" U.S. interests and  sanctions imposed by the Obama administration on Russia were overdue.
docs.snippet: U.S. House of Representatives Speaker Paul Ryan said on Thursday Russia "has consistently sought to undermine" U.S. interests and  sanctions imposed by the Obama administration on Russia were overdue....

headline.main: Lavrov Says Obama Tried to Stop Japan Improving Ties With Russia
headline.print_headline: Lavrov Says Obama Tried to Stop Japan Improving Ties With Russia

docs.lead_paragraph: The Obama administration tried to stop Japan improving ties with Russia and receiving President Vladimir Putin, Russian Foreign Minister Sergei Lavrov said on Tuesday.
docs.snippet: The Obama administration tried to stop Japan improving ties with Russia and receiving President Vladimir Putin, Russian Foreign Minister Sergei Lavrov said on Tuesday....

headline.main: Trump Could Reverse Effects of Obama Order on Russia: Official
headline.print_headline: Trump Could Reverse Effects of Obama Order on Russia: Official

docs.lead_paragraph: President-elect Donald Trump could reverse President Barack Obama's executive order and allow Russian intelligence officials back into the United States once he takes office, but that would be inadvisable, a senior U.S. official said on Thursday.
docs.snippet: President-elect Donald Trump could reverse President Barack Obama's executive order and allow Russian intelligence officials back into the United States once he takes office, but that would be inadvisable, a senior U.S. official said on Thursday....

headline.main: Obama Expands Environmental Legacy With 2 Western Monuments
headline.print_headline: Obama Expands Environmental Legacy With 2 Western Monuments

docs.lead_paragraph: President Barack Obama expanded his environmental legacy in the final days of his presidency with national monument designations on lands in Utah and Nevada that have become flashpoints over use of public land in the U.S. West.
docs.snippet: President Barack Obama expanded his environmental legacy in the final days of his presidency with national monument designations on lands in Utah and Nevada that have become flashpoints over use of public land in the U.S. West....

headline.main: Republicans’ Paths to Unraveling the Dodd-Frank Act
headline.print_headline: G.O.P.’s Paths to Unraveling Wall Street Rules From Obama Era

byline.contributor: Stacy Cowley, Emmarie Huetteman and Glenn Thrush contributed reporting.

keywords.value: Dodd-Frank Wall Street Reform and Consumer Protection Act (2010)
keywords.name: subject

docs.lead_paragraph: President Trump cannot unravel the law with a stroke of a pen, but congressional Republicans have multiple options for dismantling it.
docs.snippet: President Trump cannot unravel the law with a stroke of a pen, but congressional Republicans have multiple options for dismantling it....

headline.main: In Chapo’s Extradition, a Lesson for Mr. Trump

docs.lead_paragraph: President Trump would be foolish not to study the results his predecessor achieved through a pragmatic and respectful approach toward Latin America.

headline.main: Ralph Lauren’s History of Dressing First Ladies

headline.main: Actions Taken by Obama in Response to Russian Hacking
headline.print_headline: Actions Taken by Obama in Response to Russian Hacking

docs.lead_paragraph: President Barack Obama slapped harsh sanctions on the Russian intelligence services Thursday, both for the hacking that disrupted the U.S. presidential election and for the harassment of U.S. diplomats working in Russia.
docs.snippet: President Barack Obama slapped harsh sanctions on the Russian intelligence services Thursday, both for the hacking that disrupted the U.S. presidential election and for the harassment of U.S. diplomats working in Russia....

headline.main: Obama Sanctions Russia for Intervening in 2016 Election
headline.print_headline: Obama Sanctions Russia for Intervening in 2016 Election

docs.lead_paragraph: President Barack Obama on Thursday authorized a series of sanctions against Russia for intervening in the 2016 U.S. presidential election and warned of more action to come.
docs.snippet: President Barack Obama on Thursday authorized a series of sanctions against Russia for intervening in the 2016 U.S. presidential election and warned of more action to come....

headline.print_headline: Actions Taken by Obama in Response to Russian Hacking
